        Here the link to visualize the graph

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile(java.nio.file.Path path)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Save the flow graph into a .dot file
        Here the link to visualize the graph.
        All the edges, even the empty edge, are processed.
        Parameters:
        path - Output file name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Input/Output error
        See Also:
        writeFile(Path, boolean)
